app[content][about]:
Get ready to be charmed and challenged in [b]Swamped ![/b], a tower defense adventure where cuteness meets strategy!

[h2][b]Craft Your Unique Adventure[/b][/h2]

[b]Create Your Own Builds:[/b] Choose from a wide array of quirky towers, each with unique abilities and personalities. Strategically place them along the path to unleash adorable chaos on your foes!
[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/bamboo-cut.gif[/img]

[h2][b]Loot Amazing Stuff[/b][/h2]

Discover rare items, powerful artifacts, and enchanting hats that will make your heroes unstoppable.
Improve Your Character: Gain experience and level up your heroes to unlock new skills and abilities. Watch them evolve from scrappy recruits to legendary defenders.
[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/inventory.gif[/img]

[h2][b]Protect and expand Your Camp[/b][/h2]
Rescue charming Animals from danger and bring them back to your camp. Each new friend will help you through your adventure in some ways.
[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/camp.gif[/img]

[h2][b]An Enchanting World Awaits[/b][/h2]
Journey through lush forests, whimsical meadows, and mysterious caves as you face a variety of adorable foes. Each level presents new challenges and rewards, so gather your wits and your cutest defenders to conquer them all!
[img]{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/meteor.gif[/img]

[h2][b]key Features:[/b][/h2]

[list][*]Adorable visuals: Immerse yourself in a world overflowing with charm and cuteness.
[*]Strategic tower defense gameplay: Plan your defenses carefully to outsmart your enemies.
[*]RPG progression: Level up your heroes, unlock skills, and equip them with powerful gear.
[*]Tons of loot: Discover rare items, funny hats, and magical equipment to customize your team.
[*]Regular updates: Enjoy new heroes, levels, and features as the world of Swamped expands.
[*]Whether you're a seasoned tower defense veteran or a newcomer to the genre, Swamped will captivate you with its delightful world, strategic challenges, and heartwarming characters. Are you ready to defend the cutest realm ever known?[/list]

Join the fun and start your Swamped adventure today!
app[content][short_description]: Discover a [b]Tower Defense[/b] as cute as it is addictive. Collect funny hats, magical equipment, and special powers to[b] create the ultimate defense build[/b]. Explore an enchanted world filled with charming characters and challenges to overcome!
app[content][sysreqs][windows][min][proc: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU
app[content][sysreqs][linux][min][proces: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, x86_64 CPU, ARMv7 or ARMv8 CPU
